title: Truce agreed to halt Ethiopia's civil war
description: Both sides agreed to stop their conflict in Ethiopia which has led to a humanitarian crisis. Also: Parkland school gunman sentenced to life in US prison, and the oldest voter in India.
itunes:subtitle: The African Union has called the deal a new 'dawn'
itunes:summary: Both sides agreed to stop their conflict in Ethiopia which has led to a humanitarian crisis. Also: Parkland school gunman sentenced to life in US prison, and the oldest voter in India.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
